item.title: Prologue
item.description: Who Writes all this Nonsense Anyway? My name isn’t Cathy, but it could be. For those of you who don’t know me, I’m pretty chatty. I’m also a software engineer, which for reasons beyond my understanding is a profession that some people pick because they don’t like talking to other people. I therefore experience a condition I call “TAIBESE” (pronounced tie-bee-zee), short for “The Awkward Implications of Being an Extrovert in Software Engineering.
